name: linuxserver.io
body:
### Welcome to LinuxServer.io
LinuxServer.io is a cabal of like minded individuals dedicated to the pursuit of awesome, we specialise in creating the best dockers and making sure they are well maintained as well as several other promising projects.

### Real time support
We believe in maintaining an active presence on IRC as this gives our uses access to real time support as well as allowing us to communicate effectively as a team.

If you would like to check out our channel but don't know much about IRC (or just don't have an IRC client) you can use [this web client](https://kiwiirc.com/client/chat.freenode.net/#linuxserver.io)

### Feature requests
If you have a feature you would like to see included, feel free to make a feature request [here](http://feathub.com/linuxserver/linuxserver.github.io)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
